name: utill
description: A utility library for nodejs and the browser

scripts.test-all: echo if you have make installed use 'make test' && npm run lint && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec && istanbul report html

# utill

 > A utility library for nodejs and the browser. 
 

This is in early development. The API may (and will) change often.
